sentence.Network_en: We should listen to the judicious opinion of that old man.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该听取那位老人明智的意见.

sentence.Network_en: A judicious parent encourages his children to make their own decisions.
sentence.Network_cn: 贤明的父亲鼓励儿女自作抉择.

sentence.Network_en: The President authorizes the judicious use of military force to protect our citizens.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统授权可以明智而审慎地动用军队保护我们的公民。

means.word_mean: 有见识的,机灵的,敏锐的
精明的,明断的,慎重的,明智的,合理的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French judicieux, from Latin judicium 'judgement' (see judicial)

entry.tran: 明智的；有见地的；审慎的
entry.def: If you describe an action or decision as judicious, you approve of it because you think that it shows good judgment and sense.

example.ex: The President authorizes the judicious use of military force to protect our citizens.
example.tran: 总统授权可以明智而审慎地动用军队保护我们的公民。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by good judgment or sound thinking;
2. marked by the exercise of good judgment or common sense in practical matters;
3. proceeding from good sense or judgment;

auth_sentence.content: If they are judicious they will fault our dogmatism.
auth_sentence.res_content: If they are judicious they will fault our dogmatism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If they are judicious they will fault our dogmatism.

auth_sentence.content: Both of these excellent guides are valuable and judicious.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both of these excellent guides are valuable and judicious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both of these excellent guides are valuable and judicious.

auth_sentence.content: More judicious editing might have created a stronger narrative whole.
auth_sentence.res_content: More judicious editing might have created a stronger narrative whole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More judicious editing might have created a stronger narrative whole.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+judicious[adj.有判断力的,明智的]→adj.不明智的;不慎重的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的
stems_affixes.word_buile: judic判断,审理,法官+ial……的→adj.司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的
judic判断,审理,法官+iary=ary……的→adj.司法的, 法院的
judic判断,审理,法官+ious……的→adj.有判断力的,明智的
pre预先+judic判断,审理,法官+e→预先判断→有偏见
ad一再+judic判断,审理,法官+ate表动词→一再判断→裁判
pre预先+judic判断,审理,法官+e→预先判断→有偏见

sentences.en: an article with a judicious use of examples
sentences.cn: 一篇巧妙利用例证的文章

sentences.en: We should listen to the judicious opinion of that old man.
sentences.cn: 我们应该听取那位老人明智的意见。

sentences.en: At a key moment in his life, he made a judicious investment that was the foundation.
sentences.cn: 在他一生的关键时刻, 他做出了明智的投资, 这便成了他以后富裕的基础。
